blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs version 2.3.28
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded a new version of DeeEnEs (2.3.28) which now shows the detected IP address in the tray-icon tooltip as well as the log window. The list of domains was also updated to include the latest entry servergame.org. And thanks to RuX DeeEnEs is now also available in the Catalan language. And last but certainly not least as of today DeeEnEs is released under the GPL!
